item.title: Revolutionizing Tax Administration: How ViSe’s Framework Is Transforming Government Tech
item.description:
The global tax administration sector stands at a crossroads. Legacy systems strain under outdated architectures, compliance costs consume 30% of operational budgets, and citizens increasingly demand transparency in how governments manage public funds12. Enter the ViSe Framework – a groundbreaking solution redefining how governments modernize tax systems, combat fraud, and deliver citizen-centric services.

The $9.8 Trillion Efficiency Crisis in Public Finance

Tax authorities worldwide face a dual challenge: rising operational complexity and eroding public trust. The World Economic Forum estimates that inefficient governance costs the global economy $9.8 trillion annually – equivalent to 9% of global GDP2. For tax administrations, this manifests as:
